ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Change to bard song mechanics on Test!
ygData.msgSnippet: Berserker is sadly not the good song to max brass instrument. It will be much faster if you use Denon s disruptive discord. I am practicing in Arena, it s a
ygData.messageBody:
Berserker is sadly not the good song to max brass instrument.
It will be much faster if you use Denon's disruptive discord.
I am practicing in Arena, it's a good place to max Brass instrument.


-----Message d'origine-----
De : Legba Work [mailto:mattdeba@...]
Envoye : mercredi 1 novembre 2000 14:55
A : eqbards@egroups.com
Objet : Re: [eqbards] Change to bard song mechanics on Test!


Brass skill goes up absurdly slow, I have no idea why the programmed it the
way they did. I leave my computer on overnight, playing Beserker and it
goes up 6 pts in 8 hours!!! It took me three days to get it maxed...



Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
